column5: This cozy little cottage is just right for a couple, family, or two couples. The master bedroom has a king-size bed and a bath with a shower. The smaller bedroom has a queen-size bed with a tub/shower combination in the bath. There is also a living room, dining area and fully furnished kitchen. With a large front porch and a cozy screened-in back porch, there is loads of room to sit and enjoy the small-town atmosphere. A fully privacy-fenced back yard is perfect for our four-legged guests.
